entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stewart
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stewart Airport 10:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Temperature: -6.2°C
Pressure: 104.2 kPa
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: E 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
